FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.description: Common questions about our processes and technology.

list.q: How much budget should I allocate for my AI project?
list.a: The budget varies depending on the scope of your project (custom model training, existing API integration, data engineering needs). Generally, a simple RAG/Chatbot integration starts with more accessible budgets, while enterprise-level full automation processes are priced based on ROI calculation. Our initial 30-minute discovery call is free.

list.q: How do you ensure GDPR and local compliance?
list.a: Data security and privacy are our top priorities. When designing our systems, we strictly apply data residency requirements, anonymization processes, and encryption standards (AES-256). Upon request, we also deploy end-to-end closed-circuit (On-Premise) LLM setups where data never leaves your infrastructure.

list.q: Do you only do AI, or do you develop end-to-end software?
list.a: We are an end-to-end full-stack software agency. We design AI not just as an 'add-on' but as the heart of the system. We are experts in Next.js, React, Node.js, and cloud (AWS/Azure) architectures. Meaning, we can manage the entire process from your idea to a live product (SaaS).

list.q: What is the average delivery time for a project?
list.a: We can usually launch MVP (Minimum Viable Product) stage projects within 4 to 8 weeks. Enterprise transformation and large-scale automation projects take around 3 to 6 months. By following the Agile/Scrum methodology, we present you with a working product demo (Sprint Review) every 2 weeks.

list.q: Can you integrate with my existing systems (ERP, CRM)?
list.a: Yes. In addition to popular systems like SAP, Salesforce, HubSpot, and Zoho, we can also integrate with your custom (legacy) systems via REST API, SOAP, or directly at the database (ETL) layer.

list.q: Do you provide support after project delivery?
list.a: Absolutely. Every project is delivered with a warranty period. Furthermore, we offer SLA-based maintenance/support agreements for continuous system optimization, model updates, server maintenance (DevOps), and 24/7 guaranteed response times.
